Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: Don't you have something better to do rather than staring at me?

Choices.Choice1: Insist that you must stay to ensure the tea quality
Choices.Choice2: Insist that you must stay as ordered, but have no clue why.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I'm afraid I have to stay, sir.
Speaker.line2: It's our duty to ensure the quality of tea for every passenger.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I'm afraid no can do, sir.
Speaker.line2: We've been instructed to take care of the tea until it's ready.
Speaker.line3: To be frank, I'm not sure why either.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line3: Suitable for a middle-class like you.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: It's apparently helpless, judging from the meal you've brought me.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: I just hope that damn tea of yours will be ready soon.
Speaker.line2: I can't wait to enjoy my meal 'alone'.
